name: Snake Gets Fruit or Rotten Fruit
name_original: Snake Gets Fruit or Rotten Fruit
description:
This is a snake game you know the old game you play anywhere on your phone if you get bored.

There are 2 types of fruit: Regular fruit you can eat it and gain body length

Rotten fruit you can't eat it, no body length gain, and you die from eating it.

The controls of the game are W=Move up  A=Move left  S=Move down  D=Move right

Mobile controls is simple just the arrows that is show on the screen
